channel.title: Vista and Xp Networking
channel.description:
I've recently been trying to network my vista so it will connect to my Xp desktop (to share a printer). I've managed to install LLTD Responder on my Xp, so that i can view it on the vista network map. The only thing is i cannot access/connect to my Xp, although i can connect to my vista pc through my Xp.
Has anyone had this problem? I've been searching for about 2 hours now and still haven't found a resolution.

item.title: Vista and Xp Networking
item.dc:creator: @Baros_Rocks Baros Rocks

I’ve recently been trying to network my vista so it will connect to my Xp desktop (to share a printer). The only thing is i cannot access/connect to my Xp, although i can connect to my vista pc through my Xp.

Has anyone had this problem? I’ve been searching for about 2 hours now and still haven’t found a resolution.
